item.title: DuoNB Alliance is being soft-launched - let's get started! 🚀
item.description: DuoNB Alliance / 物联技术开放联盟 is being boostrapped by a small but dedicated group of professionals from a diverse practices. We have entreprenures, veteran product & product managers, senior software architects, networking engineerings, VCs … who’s been working on smart home appliances and systems, connected products, large scale software project, and telco-grade networking technologies. What are binding us as a community are the DuoNB Principles. under which connected appliances or products should be built.
